description: Episode of Series "The Springs of learning". The importance of the early years of childhood is discussed by Dr. K. Lovell of the Institute of Education, University of Leeds, Dr. C.B. Hindley of the Centre for Study of Human Development, University of London, and Dr. W.A. Marshall of the Institute of Child Health, University of London.
